sentences.english: For I will forgive their wickedness and will remember their sins no more.
sentences.chinese: 我要寬恕他們的不義，不再記念他們的罪愆。

sentences.english: My self corrupting salving thy amiss.
sentences.chinese: 弄髒我自己來洗滌你的罪愆。

sentences.english: For I will be merciful toward their iniquities , and I will remember their sins no more.
sentences.chinese: 我要寬恕他們的不義，不再記念他們的罪愆。

sentences.english: He'll forgive your sins and save your soul forever.
sentences.chinese: 他會赦免你的罪愆，永遠拯救你的靈魂。

sentences.english: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more.
sentences.chinese: 以後就說，我不再記念他們的罪愆，和他們的過犯。

sentences.english: Vile and full of sin I am, Thou art full of truth and grace.
sentences.chinese: 我污穢多有罪愆，放滿有真理恩典。

sentences.english: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.
sentences.chinese: 我要寬恕他們的不義，不再記念他們的罪愆。
這樣溺愛着自己實在是罪愆。

sentences.english: make me to know my transgression and my sin.
sentences.chinese: 求你叫我知道我的過犯與罪愆。
